creditline: Gift of Cy and Paula DeCosse
inscription: verso BL, graphite: Sunshine Gate / 1/15 CD
markings:
stamped verso BL: This edition in platinum metals / is limited to 15 numbered / and signed prints.
stamped verso BR: PHOTOGRAPHY BY CY DECOSSE / Copyright / Not to be reproduced / without written permission / from Cy DeCosse or his assigns.
signed: BR below image, graphite: Cy DeCosse 1993
text: Since the mid-1990s the photographer Cy DeCosse has been collaborating with the photographer Keith Taylor in experimenting with earlier printing processes, including the platinum-palladium process. As exhibited through the twelve artworks in the portfolio of “The Gates of Florence, ” each print is carefully printed to evoke the atmosphere of the original site. DeCosse’s lens and Taylor’s printing evoke the warmth of the sun that shines through the gates of DeCosse’s beloved Florence, the city where he first learned about photography.
title: Sunshine Gate
